data.message:
Em just broke the internet today. 
But on a side note. How did Danny Brown work with Em before Hopsin did!?

replies.message: Cuz he's from Detroit just like everyone on the track

I knew that. Obviously makes sense for this track. But I was just saying in general. Hop had a huge buzz and even had slaughterhouse members talk about songs of his. He's toured with yelawolf and tech who has worked with slaughter and D12. I just want that collab so bad.
Hop hasn't even met Em yet. It would be a dope collab tho. Long as hop doesn't do the hook. As much as I love him as a rapper, his over done attempts at 80s r&b singing get old.
I want them to do a song together but hop bases his whole style on eminem so it would be interesting to hear

I was disappointed by the fact big Sean was on the song. Like everyone on the song did there part pretty good then big Sean comes on starts rehashing some previously used lines then starts talking about weed then talks about how his content is "new lines".
